ExportDataConfig.name: export KPIs data
ExportDataConfig.title: "KPI Id"; "Objective Id"; "Name"; "Weight"; "Target"; "Min"; "Unit"; "Formula Id"; "Management method"; "compare type"; "Calculation method"; "Data type"; "Orga"; "Personal"; "QUASI-range"; "Description";
ExportDataConfig.sql: select ID, OBJ_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, TARGET, MIN, UNIT, FOR_ID, MANAGEMENT, COMPARE_TYPE, CAL, DATA_TYPE, ORGA_MEASURE_SEPARATE, USER_MEASURE_SEPARATE, QUASI_RANGE, DESCRIPTION from bb_kpi order by ID asc limit 500
ExportDataConfig.description: export KPIs data to csv file.
